user.title: We are happy to see you
user.text: All our questionnaires are confidential, scientifically validated, so you can live a healthier and more productive life.

manager.title: Welcome,
manager.text: All our questionnaires were created on a scientific basis. See the results we got from your team.

teamResults.title: Ourmind results!
teamResults.text: Here you can find the profile of symptoms we found in your team. This is your company's global report is confidential, it is not possible to identify any of the respondents. Each main dimension (anxiety symptoms, depressive symptoms, symptoms of burnout, stress and risk of substance use) is represented in a separate graph. See description of findings in the legends.

greetings.questionnaires: Here you will find a list of all available questionnaires, details such as the period for filling in, and you can follow up on the team's participation!

questionaries.title: You still don't have any questionnaires to fill out
questionaries.description: Once your company has questionnaires, they will be available here in this section

myResults.title: No results to display yet
myResults.description: After completing the questionnaires, the results in this section will be displayed

header.title: To access the jungle platform you must accept the Terms of Agreement
text: INFORMATION OF CONSENT FOR PROCESSING PERSONAL DATA - Jungle Medical Science for Business
You were invited to participate in the Great Questions for Healthier Minds Screening Cycle, developed by JUNGLE CONSULTORIA LTDA (CNPJ n. 41.484.118/0001-10) and offered by your contracting company.

1.This document aims to register the free, informed and unambiguous manifestation by which you agree to the treatment of your personal data in accordance with the LGPD - General Law for the Protection of Personal Data. Law No. 13-709/18, and other legislation as well as the Jungle Medical Science for Business Privacy and Data Protection Policy (www.junglex.com/politica-de-privacidade/).

By expressing your acceptance of this term, you consent and agree that the processing of your personal data[1] and sensitive personal data[2] will be carried out for the specific purposes set forth herein
In the event of non-acceptance of the terms proposed here, your participation will remain impossible.

purpose0.title: I — Purpose of the Program
text: The Great Questions for Healthier Minds Screening Cycle is a pre-screening/mapping program that collects information on the participant's levels of symptoms related to mental health. . to verify the levels of protection against symptoms of Anxiety, Burnout, Depression, Stress and Substance Use, in addition to aspects intrinsic to the individual such as resilience, flexibility, work-life balance, self-fulfillment, family, work, financial organization and quality of life . with the purpose of proposing Programs for the Promotion of Health and Well-being.

The Great Questions for Healthier Minds Screening Cycle will be carried out under the supervision of a Jungle medical specialist (Psychiatrist) remotely (online platform). contemplating the following steps:
Online questionnaires: application of individual and anonymous questionnaires via an online platform (Dashboard of the Jungle Collaborator) on the topics listed above;
Analysis: of the information collected via questionnaires based on scientific scales;
Issuance of an Individual Report that will be made available confidentially to the Participant via an online platform (Dashboard of Jungle Employee);

Monitoring: with motivational, educational and support scope, the Participant will have available a direct e-mail channel with the Jungle medical team to inquire about doubts and gather information about the program and its results

Issuance of a Global Report: which will be made available to the contracting company (Dashboard of Jungle Manager) with the consolidated results of the entire group by areas and demographics. so as not to allow, under any circumstances, the visualization of results by individuals, ensuring the anonymization of all Participants.

If there is no return from the Participant to the emails sending the individual access token to the online platform (Jungle Collaborator Dashboard), it will be registered as if there was no interest in participating in the program.
Under no circumstances will the diagnosis of diseases be made nor will any medical treatment be prescribed.

purpose1.title: II — Treatment of Personal Data
text: We collect your personal data and sensitive personal data. such as full name, CPE date of birth, telephone, email and other health data that may be processed during participation in the Program, for its proper execution, to offer other programs that you are able to participate and for us to communicate with you.

All personal data and sensitive personal data will be considered confidential and as such will be protected in order to protect the privacy of the holders of said data, in compliance with the relevant legislation, especially the LGPD. without prejudice to the duty of secrecy in relation to to medical information

purpose2.title: III — Sharing of Personal Data
text: For the full and adequate provision of the Great Questions for Healthier Minds Screening Cycle, your common personal data and sensitive personal data (health data) will be available for consultation by the Jungle team, within the limits of medical confidentiality, LGPD and other applicable legislation , observing the limits of strict necessity, ensuring that the recipient is able to safeguard confidentiality and adequate protection.

In relation to health data. Jungle clarifies that the data received by its contracting company will be statistical in order to provide indexes for the application of internal health and well-being policies

purpose3.title: IV — Personal Data Storage
text: Your personal data will be deleted by Jungle when they are no longer necessary or relevant for the purposes defined herein or upon your request, provided that this does not conflict with the fulfillment of legal, regulatory and/or legal obligations for the regular exercise of our rights

purpose4.title: V — Personal Data Security Measures
text: Jungle will observe strict security standards and good practices through the use of reasonable and available tools and technologies, in addition to technical and administrative measures capable of protecting personal data from unauthorized access and from accidental or illegal situations.

purpose5.title: VI — Right of Withdrawal of Consent
text: The consent expressed herein may be revoked by you, the Participant, at any time, upon request by e-mail.
By completing and marking this form accordingly, you, the Participant, expressly and unequivocally declare that you are aware:
of the objectives, purpose and functioning of the Great Ouestions for Healthier Minds Tracking Cycle;
the collection and processing of your personal data, including your sensitive data (clinical/health data);
the sharing between Jungle and the contracting company, within the limits of medical confidentiality and under the terms of the current data protection law and other applicable laws;
that participation in the Program is completely Free, being entirely at Your discretion, and may opt-out at any time by express notice

3. After carefully reading the above information and clarifying all doubts, I AGREE TO PARTICIPATE, of my own free will, in the Great Questions for Healthier Minds Screening Cycle and agree with the terms proposed herein.
2021 - JUNGLE CONSULTORIA LTDA - www.junglex.com
footer.otherText: I am aware of the terms and agree to participate
